scripts.deploy:dev: yarn --production=true && yarn build && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn --production=true && yarn build && serverless deploy --stage prod
scripts.test:changePassword: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f changePassword -p test/events/changePassword.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:getEngineers: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f getEngineers --stage dev
scripts.test:login: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f login -p test/events/login.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:mail: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f mail -p test/events/mail.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:updateEngineer: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f updateEngineer -p test/events/updateEngineer.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:getGear: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f getGear --stage dev
scripts.test:addGear: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f addGear -p test/events/addGear.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:updateGear: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f updateGear -p test/events/updateGear.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:deleteGear: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f deleteGear -p test/events/deleteGear.event.json --stage dev
scripts.test:uploadFile: yarn build && source e2e.env && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke local -f uploadFile -p test/events/uploadFile.event.json --stage dev
